titles.title: Iran Initiative Investigation House Resolution
A resolution establishing a Select Committee to Investigate the Iran Initiative and Related Events, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Rules.

bill.summary: 1/7/1987--Introduced. Iran Initiative Investigation House Resolution - Creates a Select Committee to Investigate the Iran Initiative and Related Events. Requires such committee to report to the House of Representatives by April 15, 1987.
